info.name: Imgur: 'New Look' Tweaker
info.description: Tweaks the new Imgur theme in a way that is hopefully at least easier on the eyes.
info.additionalInfo:
2016/07/28:
- More color corrections.
- Changed Reply button color to blue.
- Fixed odd-looking background on the sign-in dialog.


2016/07/27:
- Fixed a typo for some green replacements (accidentally used #39C422 instead of #39C442).
- Fixed more "new green" occurrences.


2016/07/26:
- Reverted most instances of "new green" (#1bb76e, better known as GREEN-BLUE YOU IDIOTS) to "old green" (#39c442).
- Other minor details adjusted.


2016/07/25 (again, sorry!):
- Overhauled the voting buttons and comment reply counter. They've been moved to the left of the Reply button now. Comment threads are now more compact as a result.
- Extended upvote/downvote border indicator to be on both the left and right sides of a comment.

2016/07/25:
- Overhauled the Reply button. It is now a small button in the top-right, out of the way of comment text. This is just an initial test.


2016/07/24 (again):
- Updated some things to match more recent changes made by Imgur. They have darkened some colors but the blue hues remained, so I've darkened my replacements accordingly.

2016/07/24:
- More blue-grays changed to neutral replacements.
- Improvements to profile page styling (rounded off some corners, color adjustments).
- Workaround Firefox bug where a stray line of pixels appears between an album's last image description and the post options (before screenshot: http://i.imgur.com/2EexoTI.png )
